content: little homestead lovey crochet pattern by cedar hill fiber farm this sweet and simple lovey is perfect for using up scraps and wrapping little hands in handmade comfort crocheted in a soothing linen stitch and finished with a wooden or silicone teething ring it s the perfect blend of cozy and practical ideal for gifting or making for your own little one this is a make it your own kind of project adjust the size change up the colors and use whatever yarn you have on hand depending on your chosen yarn weight and final size you ll need around 50 100 yards sport to worsted weight yarns work beautifully thinner yarns will require more yardage and produce a lighter more delicate result while thicker yarns will create a cushier feel for best results choose a yarn that s soft and baby-friendly natural fibers like cotton wool or angora are especially lovely they offer gentle texture for little hands and are soothing against the skin with just the right amount of squish pair it with a natural teething ring and you ve got a handmade treasure that s as functional as it is adorable cedarhillfiberfarm com claudia gross 1 of 3 materials j 6 0 mm crochet hook 50 100 yards of sport
